product_overview: Nébula Studio is a dark-premium, cinematic single-page website designed to convert visitors into high-ticket clients by showcasing authority in Branding, AI and Strategy while capturing leads through an in-page contact form.
core_goals: Convert visitors into high-ticket clients via a premium cinematic experience.
Validate and showcase authority in Branding, AI and Strategy.
Provide immersive visual interactions (glitch title, cursor glow, scroll reveal, radial stats, magnetic buttons).
Capture qualified leads through an accessible, validated contact form with in-page AJAX-style feedback.
Ensure full responsiveness, accessibility, and SEO/social metadata for share previews.

features.name: Landing Page Navigation
features.description: Fixed desktop nav and smooth in-page scrolling to key sections (services, contact, process) with backdrop blur and reveal-on-scroll behavior.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click 'Serviços' to scroll to /#servicos -> Observe services section reveal on scroll
Navigate to / -> Click 'Sua Jornada' to view process steps at /#sua-jornada -> Observe process steps revealed sequentially
Navigate to / -> Click 'Contato' to scroll to /#contato -> Observe contact section is focused and visible
Navigate to / -> Click 'Serviços' to scroll to /#servicos -> Observe no scroll or incorrect destination -> See services section not visible (anchor/link integrity failure)

features.name: Contact Form (Lead Gen)
features.description: In-page contact form that validates required fields (Nome, Contato) and replaces itself with a confirmation message on successful submit without reloading the page.
user_flows: Navigate to /#contato -> Fill 'Nome' input -> Fill 'Contato' input (email/phone) -> Click Submit button -> See success message 'Obrigado' replace the form
Navigate to /#contato -> Leave 'Nome' input empty -> Fill 'Contato' input -> Click Submit button -> See validation error for 'Nome' field
Navigate to /#contato -> Fill 'Nome' input -> Leave 'Contato' input empty -> Click Submit button -> See validation error for 'Contato' field
Navigate to /#contato -> Fill 'Nome' input -> Fill invalid 'Contato' input -> Click Submit button -> See validation error for 'Contato' format

features.name: Mobile Menu (Responsive Navigation)
features.description: Hamburger overlay menu for mobile that opens/closes and navigates to page anchors, closing automatically after link selection or when tapping outside.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click hamburger icon to open menu -> Click menu link 'Serviços' to navigate to /#servicos -> Observe menu closes and page scrolls to services
Navigate to / -> Click hamburger icon to open menu -> Click outside the menu overlay -> Observe menu closes
Navigate to / -> Click hamburger icon to open menu -> Click menu link -> Observe menu remains open or link not navigated (menu interaction failure)

features.name: Visual & Interactive Effects
features.description: Cinematic visual features: dynamic glitch title cycling phrases, smooth interpolated cursor glow, scroll-reveal animations, radial stat animations when in viewport, and magnetic buttons reacting to cursor proximity.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> See main title cycle phrases with Glitch Effect without layout shift
Navigate to / -> Move mouse across page -> Observe Cursor Glow follows mouse smoothly
Navigate to / -> Scroll down -> Observe elements gain 'reveal' class and animate into view
Navigate to / -> Scroll to stats section -> Observe Radial Stats animate from 0 to their target values when in viewport
Navigate to / -> Hover cursor near CTA button -> Observe button respond with magnetic movement
Navigate to / -> Rapidly move mouse and scroll -> Observe FPS drop below 60 -> See cursor glow stutter and some reveal animations fail to run (performance degradation)

features.name: Accessibility & SEO
features.description: Social metadata for optimized previews, Material Symbols for intuitive navigation, and ARIA/support for screen readers to ensure accessibility.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Inspect page metadata -> See social meta tags (title, description, open graph) present
Navigate to / -> Use screen reader to navigate -> Observe navigation items have accessible labels and Material Symbols are announced
Navigate to / -> Inspect icons and buttons -> See aria-labels or accessible names missing -> Screen reader cannot resolve some controls (accessibility gap detected)
